sense.name: a boundary trace of an object
sense.examples: Using charcoal, the artist quickly drew an outline of the dancer. The outline of a face was barely visible through the dense fog. This outline is for the back panel of the coat, not the front of it.

sense.name: a sketchy summary or overview of something
sense.examples: In one hour I can only give you the briefest outline of the current state of genetic engineering. The article covers the main outline of his political career.

sense.name: a document which is a schematic plan of something
sense.examples: The professor handed out a three-page outline of the course on the first day of class. The students had to hand in a one-page outline of their proposed essay by Friday. The architect delivered preliminary outlines of the proposed shopping mall to the building committee.
